column2: #N/A
column3:
All Demon brake pads are metallic bronze washed pads contain copper, tin, graphite and other metallic elements with nonferrous filaments.

The high-density built material results in consistent friction across a full range of operating temperatures and reduces brake fade at high temperatures.
Provides instant braking performance in wet or muddy conditions with exceptional stability in all temperatures.

The sintered metal brake pads are proven to last longer than carbon, Kevlar, semi-metallic and other organic brake pads.

column2: 2015–2018 CFMOTO ZFORCE 800 Front Heavy Duty Tie Rod
column3:
Demon Powersports heavy duty tie rods are made from high strength 6061 T6 aircraft-grade aluminum. The kit comes compelete with everything needed for installation. The kit is a direct OEM replacement and does not require any modifications to install. 
The Tie rods are optimized to increase strength and eliminate factory failure points  while retaining factory clevis. This kit eliminates the factory break points while retaining the factory clevis assembly. This ensures you are not stranded when on the trails!

column2: 2012–2025 Can-Am Outlander 1000/1000 Max/450/450 Max/500/500 Max/570/570 Max/650/650 Max/800/800 Max/850 Max/850, Renegade 500/570/800/1000/850 Rear Right Xtreme Heavy Duty Lift Kit Axle
column3:
Our Strongest Axles To Date 

Our X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles are “Hell Rated” – upgraded from our Heavy Duty Line to handle the harshest terrains for racing in Desert, Sand, Mud, Rock and Short Courses. Demon X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles are our strongest axles to date. 

Through years of research and development Demon Powersports has developed a RACE READY, ULTIMATE PERFORMANCE axle that doesn’t burn a hole in your pocket and adheres to the highest quality standards. The success behind our products stems from thorough quality control. Our products go through extensive and extreme testing and R&D before launching.? 

Entire Axle Made Up of 4340 Chromoly Steel Material (In-and-Out) 

These axles are bigger, beefier, and stronger. Demon X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles are built using larger CV joints and shafts, paired with our proprietary dual heat treatment process, and 4340 Chromoly Steel material for all its components including the shaft, housing, cage, race, and balls.  

This gives the axles the edge it needs for superior strength and longevity. We re-engineered our cage design to enhance durability and use Molybdenum grease to lubricate the internal components. The axle's inner components are micro-polished, so the CVs don't heat up like other products.  

4340 chromoly steel is more elastic meaning the axle shaft and its components will absorb any stress and keeps it within itself, eliminating any stress from being transferred into the differential and through your drivetrain. This helps preserve other components on the car! 

Available for Long Travel Kits 

Our X-Treme Heavy Duty are also tailored made to work with all major Long Travel Suspension Kits & Lift Kits. We understand the requirment for the desert and dunes. As provide an out of the box solution since they are already optimized for heat so your CVs can run cooler and last longer.  If you don’t believe us talk to any one of our racers in BITD, SCORE, SNORA, DAKHAR etc whom trust and use our products! 

Our long travel axles are tailor made to fit the following suspension kits Cognito Motorsports, Extreme Performance, Fireball Racing HCR, NXS Designs, Madigan Motorsports, SF Raceworks, LSK, Lone Star Racing, Fifty6 Industries, FabWerx, Grounder 4, UTV Wolfpack, Reflex, Long Travel Industries and much more!! 

If you need a long travel axle click here to get directed to the correct page! (INSERT LINK) 

Backed with 2-Years Limited Warranty 

Demon Xtreme axles come with an industry first 2yr limited warranty! We know our axles are built and designed for the baddest and toughest machines, that’s why we have paired our axles with the best warranty in the industry! Our #1 priority here at Demon Powersports is your happiness. Which means we stand behind our products. If you have a problem, we will solve it. Just reach out to our Customer Support Team. We’re here for you. Happiness & Performance guaranteed. 

Trust In Demon X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles To Keep You Riding!! 

If you have an axle that is optimized for heat and strength then you can have no fear running more power or larger tires on your machine meaning you can have the baddest and toughest machine out there without worrying about getting left behind in the sand, rocks, trail or mud!!

column2: 2009–2025 Polaris Sportsman 550/850/WV850/1000, Scrambler 850/1000 Rear Left, Rear Right Heavy Duty Lift Kit Axle
column3:
Through years of research and development Demon Powersports has developed an axle that doesn’t burn a hole in your pocket and adheres to the highest quality standards. These axles are bigger, beefier, and stronger. 
Demon Heavy Duty Lift kit Axles are built using larger CV joints and shafts, paired with our proprietary dual heat treatment process, and 4340 Chromoly Steel inner CV cage gives these the axles the edge it needs for superior strength and longevity. 
These axles also utilize a unique double plunge design which allows it to achieve higher articulation angles approximately, the axles are designed to slide on the bar splines allowing for 1.5 inches of travel and 40° articulation over terrain on the inboard joint. The outboard joint can travel 0.5inches and swing from 45°-47° depending on the model. 
The Demon heavy duty axles are equipped The TPEE (Thermoplastic polyester elastomer) boots which are stronger, stiffer, more fatigue resistant, puncture resistant, and more temperature resistant than a standard OEM boot.  Axles use molybdenum grease to provide low friction and smooth motion.
Trust in Demon Heavy Duty Axles to keep you riding!!

column2: 2017–2020 Can-Am Maverick X3/X3 Max Front Electric Power Steering Kit
column3:
Significantly Reduces Steering Efforts 

The Rugged Electric Power Steering Kit is a must have for any off-road enthusiast. Each kit is a bolt-on system that reduces steering effort and gets rid of wheel jerk/bump steer when navigating rough terrains.  

It allows you to steer easily with one hand or even just one finger on the wheel. Designed to make your ride better, even when running larger tires or modified suspension. 

The mount plate positions the motor and steering shafts under the dash for discrete visibility with no driver interference. All components are sealed to protect against water, dust, and other debris. The kit is complete to easily covert your machine’s steering to EPS! 

Available For ATV & UTV Applications 

We offer kits for all the popular brands: Polaris, Can Am, Honda, Kawasaki, Yamaha, John Deere, Cf-Moto, Hisun and many more. 

Universal kits are available which are adaptable for Offshore ATV/UTV, Hot Rod, Mini Sprints, Buggies, Rock Crawlers, Mowers and more! 

Trust In Rugged EPS Kits to Keep You Riding!! 

Dominate the trails with ease. The success behind our products stems from thorough quality control and testing. Our products go through extensive and extreme testing, and R&D before launching.? 

Backed by a 1-Year Limited Warranty 

Our #1 priority here at Demon Powersports is your happiness. Which means we stand behind our products. If you have a problem, we will solve it. Just reach out to our Customer Support Team. We’re here for you. Happiness & Performance guaranteed.

column2: 2009–2014 Polaris Ranger 700/800 Demon Heavy Duty Bracket Lift Kit
column3: Take your machine to a new height! This 4 corner lift will pick your machine making room for larger tires. This also gives your vehicle a more beefy stance while giving practicality of more ground clearance. Lift kit consists of all parts, hardware and instructions to be installed. Install time is approximately 1 1/2 to 2 hours. This lift kit has been engineered with longevity and hard use in mind. A must have if you're wanting to get the most ground clearance out of your vehicle without harming your factory suspension.

column2: All Years Access Rear Rugged Wheel Spacer
column3:
Rugged wheels spacers are made from T6061 aluminum alloy and are precisely CNC machined for accurate dimensions. Spacers can be direct bolt on and can use OEM studs. Each wheel spacer comes in 3 different thickness. Each wheel spacer comes with a 1 year warranty. 
If you are looking to widen the stance of your machine, clear larger tires or get some new rims. These spacers are just what you need.

These axles are bigger, beefier, and stronger. Demon X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles are built using larger CV joints and shafts, paired with our proprietary dual heat treatment process, and 4340 Chromoly Steel material for all its components including the shaft, housing, cage, race, and balls.  

This gives the axles the edge it needs for superior strength and longevity. We re-engineered our cage design to enhance durability and use Molybdenum grease to lubricate the internal components. The axle's inner components are micro-polished, so the CVs don't heat up like other products.  

4340 chromoly steel is more elastic meaning the axle shaft and its components will absorb any stress and keeps it within itself, eliminating any stress from being transferred into the differential and through your drivetrain. This helps preserve other components on the car! 

Available for Long Travel Kits 

Our X-Treme Heavy Duty are also tailored made to work with all major Long Travel Suspension Kits & Lift Kits. We understand the requirment for the desert and dunes. As provide an out of the box solution since they are already optimized for heat so your CVs can run cooler and last longer.  If you don’t believe us talk to any one of our racers in BITD, SCORE, SNORA, DAKHAR etc whom trust and use our products! 

Our long travel axles are tailor made to fit the following suspension kits Cognito Motorsports, Extreme Performance, Fireball Racing HCR, NXS Designs, Madigan Motorsports, SF Raceworks, LSK, Lone Star Racing, Fifty6 Industries, FabWerx, Grounder 4, UTV Wolfpack, Reflex, Long Travel Industries and much more!! 

If you need a long travel axle click here to get directed to the correct page! (INSERT LINK) 

Backed with 2-Years Limited Warranty 

Demon Xtreme axles come with an industry first 2yr limited warranty! We know our axles are built and designed for the baddest and toughest machines, that’s why we have paired our axles with the best warranty in the industry! Our #1 priority here at Demon Powersports is your happiness. Which means we stand behind our products. If you have a problem, we will solve it. Just reach out to our Customer Support Team. We’re here for you. Happiness & Performance guaranteed.

column2: 2020–2025 Polaris Sportsman 1000, Scrambler 1000 Front Left, Front Right Heavy Duty Axle
column3:
Through years of research and development Demon Powersports has developed an axle that doesn’t burn a hole in your pocket and adheres to the highest quality standards. These axles are bigger, beefier, and stronger. 
Demon Heavy Duty Axles are built using larger CV joints and shafts, paired with our proprietary dual heat treatment process, and 4340 Chromoly Steel inner CV cage gives these the axles the edge it needs for superior strength and longevity. 
These axles also utilize a unique double plunge design which allows it to achieve higher articulation angles approximately, the axles are designed to slide on the bar splines allowing for 1.5 inches of travel and 40° articulation over terrain on the inboard joint. The outboard joint can travel 0.5inches and swing from 45°-47° depending on the model. 
The Demon heavy duty axles are equipped The TPEE (Thermoplastic polyester elastomer) boots which are stronger, stiffer, more fatigue resistant, puncture resistant, and more temperature resistant than a standard OEM boot.  Axles use molybdenum grease to provide low friction and smooth motion.
Trust in Demon Heavy Duty Axles to keep you riding!!

column2: 2017–2025 Can-Am Maverick X3/X3 Max Front Left, Front Right Xtreme Heavy Duty Axle Race Spec 300M
column3:
Our Strongest Axle to Date, You can say we have of the strongest UTV/SXS axles on the market if not “the one”.
We have made our best axle even better now. The Demon Xtreme Race Spec axles are redesigned and re-engineered with a robust 300M shaft designed to flex and absorb force, ensuring unparalleled durability. Say goodbye to constant CV breakages and drivetrain failures – our product is engineered to withstand the toughest challenges, making it perfect for heavy lifting, oversized tires, and endless adventures. Get ready for a driving experience like never before with our solution tailored for maximum strength and fun.
Keeping true to our roots we have developed a RACE READY ultimate performance axle that does not burn a hole in your pocket an adheres to the highest quality standard. 
What sets the 300M steel apart is its composition. This aircraft-grade alloy is a modified, reinforced version of the already robust 4340 chromoly, enhanced with the addition of Vanadium and a higher silicon content. Vanadium, a common element in high-speed tool steel (HSS), plays a crucial role in elevating the steel's strength to unparalleled levels. This means our 300M axles are built to withstand even the most demanding conditions, ensuring maximum durability and longevity. The increased Silicon content further enhances the steel's strength and hardness, while also providing superior resistance to high-temperature oxidation. This means you can count on our 300M axles to perform flawlessly, even in the harshest environments.

column2: 2011–2022 Honda TRX500, TRX420, TRX520 Demon Heavy Duty Bracket Lift Kit
column3: Take your machine to a new height! This 4 corner lift will pick your machine making room for larger tires. This also gives your vehicle a more beefy stance while giving practicality of more ground clearance. Lift kit consists of all parts, hardware and instructions to be installed. Install time is approximately 1 1/2 to 2 hours. This lift kit has been engineered with longevity and hard use in mind. A must have if you're wanting to get the most ground clearance out of your vehicle without harming your factory suspension.

The propeller shafts are fitted with greased heavy duty u-joints that are replaceable if needed.  Rugged stands behind every shaft, backing them with a 1 year limited warranty.

column2: 2008–2014 Polaris RZR 800 Rear Left, Rear Right Heavy Duty Lift Kit Axle
column3:
Through years of research and development Demon Powersports has developed an axle that doesn’t burn a hole in your pocket and adheres to the highest quality standards. These axles are bigger, beefier, and stronger. 
Demon Heavy Duty Lift kit Axles are built using larger CV joints and shafts, paired with our proprietary dual heat treatment process, and 4340 Chromoly Steel inner CV cage gives these the axles the edge it needs for superior strength and longevity. 
These axles also utilize a unique double plunge design which allows it to achieve higher articulation angles approximately, the axles are designed to slide on the bar splines allowing for 1.5 inches of travel and 40° articulation over terrain on the inboard joint. The outboard joint can travel 0.5inches and swing from 45°-47° depending on the model. 
The Demon heavy duty axles are equipped The TPEE (Thermoplastic polyester elastomer) boots which are stronger, stiffer, more fatigue resistant, puncture resistant, and more temperature resistant than a standard OEM boot.  Axles use molybdenum grease to provide low friction and smooth motion.
Trust in Demon Heavy Duty Axles to keep you riding!!

column2: 2012–2025 Polaris General 1000, Ranger 1000/570/Diesel/900, RZR 900/1000/RS1/PRO XP/Turbo S Rear Center Demon Heavy Duty Carrier Bearing
column3:
Are you having problems with your stock bearing making some extra noise or vibrations? In that case, make your ride vibration free with Demon Heavy Duty Carrier Bearing. 
Made up of 6061 Billet Aluminum material, stronger than stock. Replaceable labyrinth seal metal shielded bearing for longevity giving you smoother riding experience.
Polyurethane bushing reduces side load from the prop shaft, keeping vibration to a minimum, giving you more long hauls of worry-free riding!

column2: 2016–2021 Polaris General 1000 Demon Heavy Duty Bracket Lift Kit
column3: Take your machine to a new height! This 4 corner lift will pick your machine making room for larger tires. This also gives your vehicle a more beefy stance while giving practicality of more ground clearance. Lift kit consists of all parts, hardware and instructions to be installed. Install time is approximately 1 1/2 to 2 hours. This lift kit has been engineered with longevity and hard use in mind. A must have if you're wanting to get the most ground clearance out of your vehicle without harming your factory suspension.

column2: 2017–2025 Can-Am Maverick X3/X3 Max Front Left, Front Right Xtreme Heavy Duty Long Travel Axle
column3:
Our Strongest Axles To Date 

Our X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles are “Hell Rated” – upgraded from our Heavy Duty Line to handle the harshest terrains for racing in Desert, Sand, Mud, Rock and Short Courses. Demon X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles are our strongest axles to date. 

Through years of research and development Demon Powersports has developed a RACE READY, ULTIMATE PERFORMANCE axle that doesn’t burn a hole in your pocket and adheres to the highest quality standards. The success behind our products stems from thorough quality control. Our products go through extensive and extreme testing and R&D before launching.? 

Entire Axle Made Up of 4340 Chromoly Steel Material (In-and-Out) 

These axles are bigger, beefier, and stronger. Demon X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles are built using larger CV joints and shafts, paired with our proprietary dual heat treatment process, and 4340 Chromoly Steel material for all its components including the shaft, housing, cage, race, and balls.  

This gives the axles the edge it needs for superior strength and longevity. We re-engineered our cage design to enhance durability and use Molybdenum grease to lubricate the internal components. The axle's inner components are micro-polished, so the CVs don't heat up like other products.  

4340 chromoly steel is more elastic meaning the axle shaft and its components will absorb any stress and keeps it within itself, eliminating any stress from being transferred into the differential and through your drivetrain. This helps preserve other components on the car! 

Available for Long Travel Kits 

Our X-Treme Heavy Duty are also tailored made to work with all major Long Travel Suspension Kits & Lift Kits. We understand the requirment for the desert and dunes. As provide an out of the box solution since they are already optimized for heat so your CVs can run cooler and last longer.  If you don’t believe us talk to any one of our racers in BITD, SCORE, SNORA, DAKHAR etc whom trust and use our products! 

Our long travel axles are tailor made to fit the following suspension kits Cognito Motorsports, Extreme Performance, Fireball Racing HCR, NXS Designs, Madigan Motorsports, SF Raceworks, LSK, Lone Star Racing, Fifty6 Industries, FabWerx, Grounder 4, UTV Wolfpack, Reflex, Long Travel Industries and much more!! 

If you need a long travel axle click here to get directed to the correct page! (INSERT LINK) 

Backed with 2-Years Limited Warranty 

Demon Xtreme axles come with an industry first 2yr limited warranty! We know our axles are built and designed for the baddest and toughest machines, that’s why we have paired our axles with the best warranty in the industry! Our #1 priority here at Demon Powersports is your happiness. Which means we stand behind our products. If you have a problem, we will solve it. Just reach out to our Customer Support Team. We’re here for you. Happiness & Performance guaranteed. 

Trust In Demon X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles To Keep You Riding!! 

If you have an axle that is optimized for heat and strength then you can have no fear running more power or larger tires on your machine meaning you can have the baddest and toughest machine out there without worrying about getting left behind in the sand, rocks, trail or mud!!
column6: Xtreme Heavy Duty Long Travel Axle

column2: 2018–2024 Can-Am Defender HD10/Max HD10 XMR, Limited Edition Front Left, Front Right Heavy Duty Lift Kit Axle
column3:
Through years of research and development Demon Powersports has developed an axle that doesn’t burn a hole in your pocket and adheres to the highest quality standards. These axles are bigger, beefier, and stronger. 
Demon Heavy Duty Lift kit Axles are built using larger CV joints and shafts, paired with our proprietary dual heat treatment process, and 4340 Chromoly Steel inner CV cage gives these the axles the edge it needs for superior strength and longevity. 
These axles also utilize a unique double plunge design which allows it to achieve higher articulation angles approximately, the axles are designed to slide on the bar splines allowing for 1.5 inches of travel and 40° articulation over terrain on the inboard joint. The outboard joint can travel 0.5inches and swing from 45°-47° depending on the model. 
The Demon heavy duty axles are equipped The TPEE (Thermoplastic polyester elastomer) boots which are stronger, stiffer, more fatigue resistant, puncture resistant, and more temperature resistant than a standard OEM boot.  Axles use molybdenum grease to provide low friction and smooth motion.
Trust in Demon Heavy Duty Axles to keep you riding!!

column2: 2017–2024 Can-Am Maverick X3/X3 Max Front Right Xtreme Heavy Duty Lift Kit Axle
column3:
Our Strongest Axles To Date 

Our X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles are “Hell Rated” – upgraded from our Heavy Duty Line to handle the harshest terrains for racing in Desert, Sand, Mud, Rock and Short Courses. Demon X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles are our strongest axles to date. 

Through years of research and development Demon Powersports has developed a RACE READY, ULTIMATE PERFORMANCE axle that doesn’t burn a hole in your pocket and adheres to the highest quality standards. The success behind our products stems from thorough quality control. Our products go through extensive and extreme testing and R&D before launching.? 

Entire Axle Made Up of 4340 Chromoly Steel Material (In-and-Out) 

These axles are bigger, beefier, and stronger. Demon X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles are built using larger CV joints and shafts, paired with our proprietary dual heat treatment process, and 4340 Chromoly Steel material for all its components including the shaft, housing, cage, race, and balls.  

This gives the axles the edge it needs for superior strength and longevity. We re-engineered our cage design to enhance durability and use Molybdenum grease to lubricate the internal components. The axle's inner components are micro-polished, so the CVs don't heat up like other products.  

4340 chromoly steel is more elastic meaning the axle shaft and its components will absorb any stress and keeps it within itself, eliminating any stress from being transferred into the differential and through your drivetrain. This helps preserve other components on the car! 

Available for Long Travel Kits 

Our X-Treme Heavy Duty are also tailored made to work with all major Long Travel Suspension Kits & Lift Kits. We understand the requirment for the desert and dunes. As provide an out of the box solution since they are already optimized for heat so your CVs can run cooler and last longer.  If you don’t believe us talk to any one of our racers in BITD, SCORE, SNORA, DAKHAR etc whom trust and use our products! 

Our long travel axles are tailor made to fit the following suspension kits Cognito Motorsports, Extreme Performance, Fireball Racing HCR, NXS Designs, Madigan Motorsports, SF Raceworks, LSK, Lone Star Racing, Fifty6 Industries, FabWerx, Grounder 4, UTV Wolfpack, Reflex, Long Travel Industries and much more!! 

If you need a long travel axle click here to get directed to the correct page! (INSERT LINK) 

Backed with 2-Years Limited Warranty 

Demon Xtreme axles come with an industry first 2yr limited warranty! We know our axles are built and designed for the baddest and toughest machines, that’s why we have paired our axles with the best warranty in the industry! Our #1 priority here at Demon Powersports is your happiness. Which means we stand behind our products. If you have a problem, we will solve it. Just reach out to our Customer Support Team. We’re here for you. Happiness & Performance guaranteed. 

Trust In Demon X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles To Keep You Riding!! 

If you have an axle that is optimized for heat and strength then you can have no fear running more power or larger tires on your machine meaning you can have the baddest and toughest machine out there without worrying about getting left behind in the sand, rocks, trail or mud!!

column2: 2000–2025 Kawasaki Prairie, KFX700, Brute Force, KFX450, Mule 2510/3010/4010/PRO 820/PRO 1000/PRO 700, Teryx 800, Teryx4 800, KAF700, KAF820, KAF1000, KAT1000, KVF750, KWF 1000 Ridge, KRT800 Lower, Upper Heavy Duty Ball Joint
column3: Demon Heavy Duty Ball joints are an essential upgrade to your machines suspension! These ball joints are built based on tests they are twice as strong as OEM. We achieved that by making the entire ball joint from dual heat treated 4340 chromoly steel and zinc plating it for maximum durability. Plus our stud doesn’t  narrow down as much as stock. The Ball joints are also serviceable that’s why we put a grease fitting in our heavy duty ball joints, so you can keep it running smoothly. We also made it adjustable with a convenient threaded cap, that way you can adjust the stud tension to your liking. It’s the strongest and most reliable ball joint on the market.

column2: 2022–2025 Polaris RZR PRO XP/Turbo R/Pro S Front Left, Front Right Xtreme Heavy Duty Axle
column3:
Our Strongest Axles To Date 

Our X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles are “Hell Rated” – upgraded from our Heavy Duty Line to handle the harshest terrains for racing in Desert, Sand, Mud, Rock and Short Courses. Demon X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles are our strongest axles to date. 

Through years of research and development Demon Powersports has developed a RACE READY, ULTIMATE PERFORMANCE axle that doesn’t burn a hole in your pocket and adheres to the highest quality standards. The success behind our products stems from thorough quality control. Our products go through extensive and extreme testing and R&D before launching.? 

Entire Axle Made Up of 4340 Chromoly Steel Material (In-and-Out) 

These axles are bigger, beefier, and stronger. Demon X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles are built using larger CV joints and shafts, paired with our proprietary dual heat treatment process, and 4340 Chromoly Steel material for all its components including the shaft, housing, cage, race, and balls.  

This gives the axles the edge it needs for superior strength and longevity. We re-engineered our cage design to enhance durability and use Molybdenum grease to lubricate the internal components. The axle's inner components are micro-polished, so the CVs don't heat up like other products.  

4340 chromoly steel is more elastic meaning the axle shaft and its components will absorb any stress and keeps it within itself, eliminating any stress from being transferred into the differential and through your drivetrain. This helps preserve other components on the car! 

Available for Long Travel Kits 

Our X-Treme Heavy Duty are also tailored made to work with all major Long Travel Suspension Kits & Lift Kits. We understand the requirment for the desert and dunes. As provide an out of the box solution since they are already optimized for heat so your CVs can run cooler and last longer.  If you don’t believe us talk to any one of our racers in BITD, SCORE, SNORA, DAKHAR etc whom trust and use our products! 

Our long travel axles are tailor made to fit the following suspension kits Cognito Motorsports, Extreme Performance, Fireball Racing HCR, NXS Designs, Madigan Motorsports, SF Raceworks, LSK, Lone Star Racing, Fifty6 Industries, FabWerx, Grounder 4, UTV Wolfpack, Reflex, Long Travel Industries and much more!! 

If you need a long travel axle click here to get directed to the correct page! (INSERT LINK) 

Backed with 2-Years Limited Warranty 

Demon Xtreme axles come with an industry first 2yr limited warranty! We know our axles are built and designed for the baddest and toughest machines, that’s why we have paired our axles with the best warranty in the industry! Our #1 priority here at Demon Powersports is your happiness. Which means we stand behind our products. If you have a problem, we will solve it. Just reach out to our Customer Support Team. We’re here for you. Happiness & Performance guaranteed. 

Trust In Demon X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles To Keep You Riding!! 

If you have an axle that is optimized for heat and strength then you can have no fear running more power or larger tires on your machine meaning you can have the baddest and toughest machine out there without worrying about getting left behind in the sand, rocks, trail or mud!!

column2: 2022–2024 Polaris RZR Pro R Front Left, Front Right Xtreme Heavy Duty Axle Race Spec 300M
column3:
Our Strongest Axle to Date, You can say we have of the strongest UTV/SXS axles on the market if not “the one”.
We have made our best axle even better now. The Demon Xtreme Race Spec axles are redesigned and re-engineered with a robust 300M shaft designed to flex and absorb force, ensuring unparalleled durability. Say goodbye to constant CV breakages and drivetrain failures – our product is engineered to withstand the toughest challenges, making it perfect for heavy lifting, oversized tires, and endless adventures. Get ready for a driving experience like never before with our solution tailored for maximum strength and fun.
Keeping true to our roots we have developed a RACE READY ultimate performance axle that does not burn a hole in your pocket an adheres to the highest quality standard. 
What sets the 300M steel apart is its composition. This aircraft-grade alloy is a modified, reinforced version of the already robust 4340 chromoly, enhanced with the addition of Vanadium and a higher silicon content. Vanadium, a common element in high-speed tool steel (HSS), plays a crucial role in elevating the steel's strength to unparalleled levels. This means our 300M axles are built to withstand even the most demanding conditions, ensuring maximum durability and longevity. The increased Silicon content further enhances the steel's strength and hardness, while also providing superior resistance to high-temperature oxidation. This means you can count on our 300M axles to perform flawlessly, even in the harshest environments.
column6: Xtreme Heavy Duty Axle Race Spec 300M

column2: 2017–2022 CFMOTO CFORCE 500/400 Rear Right Heavy Duty Axle
column3:
Through years of research and development Demon Powersports has developed an axle that doesn’t burn a hole in your pocket and adheres to the highest quality standards. These axles are bigger, beefier, and stronger. 
Demon Heavy Duty Axles are built using larger CV joints and shafts, paired with our proprietary dual heat treatment process, and 4340 Chromoly Steel inner CV cage gives these the axles the edge it needs for superior strength and longevity. 
These axles also utilize a unique double plunge design which allows it to achieve higher articulation angles approximately, the axles are designed to slide on the bar splines allowing for 1.5 inches of travel and 40° articulation over terrain on the inboard joint. The outboard joint can travel 0.5inches and swing from 45°-47° depending on the model. 
The Demon heavy duty axles are equipped The TPEE (Thermoplastic polyester elastomer) boots which are stronger, stiffer, more fatigue resistant, puncture resistant, and more temperature resistant than a standard OEM boot.  Axles use molybdenum grease to provide low friction and smooth motion.
Trust in Demon Heavy Duty Axles to keep you riding!!

column2: 2017–2021 Can-Am Maverick X3/X3 Max Front Left Xtreme Heavy Duty Axle
column3:
Our Strongest Axles To Date 

Our X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles are “Hell Rated” – upgraded from our Heavy Duty Line to handle the harshest terrains for racing in Desert, Sand, Mud, Rock and Short Courses. Demon X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles are our strongest axles to date. 

Through years of research and development Demon Powersports has developed a RACE READY, ULTIMATE PERFORMANCE axle that doesn’t burn a hole in your pocket and adheres to the highest quality standards. The success behind our products stems from thorough quality control. Our products go through extensive and extreme testing and R&D before launching.? 

Entire Axle Made Up of 4340 Chromoly Steel Material (In-and-Out) 

These axles are bigger, beefier, and stronger. Demon X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles are built using larger CV joints and shafts, paired with our proprietary dual heat treatment process, and 4340 Chromoly Steel material for all its components including the shaft, housing, cage, race, and balls.  

This gives the axles the edge it needs for superior strength and longevity. We re-engineered our cage design to enhance durability and use Molybdenum grease to lubricate the internal components. The axle's inner components are micro-polished, so the CVs don't heat up like other products.  

4340 chromoly steel is more elastic meaning the axle shaft and its components will absorb any stress and keeps it within itself, eliminating any stress from being transferred into the differential and through your drivetrain. This helps preserve other components on the car! 

Available for Long Travel Kits 

Our X-Treme Heavy Duty are also tailored made to work with all major Long Travel Suspension Kits & Lift Kits. We understand the requirment for the desert and dunes. As provide an out of the box solution since they are already optimized for heat so your CVs can run cooler and last longer.  If you don’t believe us talk to any one of our racers in BITD, SCORE, SNORA, DAKHAR etc whom trust and use our products! 

Our long travel axles are tailor made to fit the following suspension kits Cognito Motorsports, Extreme Performance, Fireball Racing HCR, NXS Designs, Madigan Motorsports, SF Raceworks, LSK, Lone Star Racing, Fifty6 Industries, FabWerx, Grounder 4, UTV Wolfpack, Reflex, Long Travel Industries and much more!! 

If you need a long travel axle click here to get directed to the correct page! (INSERT LINK) 

Backed with 2-Years Limited Warranty 

Demon Xtreme axles come with an industry first 2yr limited warranty! We know our axles are built and designed for the baddest and toughest machines, that’s why we have paired our axles with the best warranty in the industry! Our #1 priority here at Demon Powersports is your happiness. Which means we stand behind our products. If you have a problem, we will solve it. Just reach out to our Customer Support Team. We’re here for you. Happiness & Performance guaranteed. 

Trust In Demon X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles To Keep You Riding!! 

If you have an axle that is optimized for heat and strength then you can have no fear running more power or larger tires on your machine meaning you can have the baddest and toughest machine out there without worrying about getting left behind in the sand, rocks, trail or mud!!

column2: 2007–2020 CFMOTO CFORCE 800/500/400/600, CF500, X6, X5 Front Left, Front Right Demon Sintered Brake Pads
column3:
All Demon brake pads are metallic bronze washed pads contain copper, tin, graphite and other metallic elements with nonferrous filaments.

The high-density built material results in consistent friction across a full range of operating temperatures and reduces brake fade at high temperatures.
Provides instant braking performance in wet or muddy conditions with exceptional stability in all temperatures.

The sintered metal brake pads are proven to last longer than carbon, Kevlar, semi-metallic and other organic brake pads.

column2: 2015–2021 Polaris RZR Turbo/Turbo S Front Center Demon Heavy Duty Carrier Bearing
column3:
Are you having problems with your stock bearing making some extra noise or vibrations? In that case, make your ride vibration free with Demon Heavy Duty Carrier Bearing. 
Made up of 6061 Billet Aluminum material, stronger than stock. Replaceable labyrinth seal metal shielded bearing for longevity giving you smoother riding experience.
Polyurethane bushing reduces side load from the prop shaft, keeping vibration to a minimum, giving you more long hauls of worry-free riding!

column2: 2015–2019 Polaris Sportsman 1000/850 Front Electric Power Steering Kit
column3:
Significantly Reduces Steering Efforts 

The Rugged Electric Power Steering Kit is a must have for any off-road enthusiast. Each kit is a bolt-on system that reduces steering effort and gets rid of wheel jerk/bump steer when navigating rough terrains.  

It allows you to steer easily with one hand or even just one finger on the wheel. Designed to make your ride better, even when running larger tires or modified suspension. 

The mount plate positions the motor and steering shafts under the dash for discrete visibility with no driver interference. All components are sealed to protect against water, dust, and other debris. The kit is complete to easily covert your machine’s steering to EPS! 

Available For ATV & UTV Applications 

We offer kits for all the popular brands: Polaris, Can Am, Honda, Kawasaki, Yamaha, John Deere, Cf-Moto, Hisun and many more. 

Universal kits are available which are adaptable for Offshore ATV/UTV, Hot Rod, Mini Sprints, Buggies, Rock Crawlers, Mowers and more! 

Trust In Rugged EPS Kits to Keep You Riding!! 

Dominate the trails with ease. The success behind our products stems from thorough quality control and testing. Our products go through extensive and extreme testing, and R&D before launching.? 

Backed by a 1-Year Limited Warranty 

Our #1 priority here at Demon Powersports is your happiness. Which means we stand behind our products. If you have a problem, we will solve it. Just reach out to our Customer Support Team. We’re here for you. Happiness & Performance guaranteed.

Demon Heavy Duty Axles are built using larger CV joints and shafts, paired with our proprietary dual heat treatment process, and 4340 Chromoly Steel inner CV cage gives these the axles the edge it needs for superior strength and longevity. 
These axles also utilize a unique double plunge design which allows it to achieve higher articulation angles approximately, the axles are designed to slide on the bar splines allowing for 1.5 inches of travel and 40° articulation over terrain on the inboard joint. The outboard joint can travel 0.5inches and swing from 45°-47° depending on the model. 
The Demon heavy duty axles are equipped The TPEE (Thermoplastic polyester elastomer) boots which are stronger, stiffer, more fatigue resistant, puncture resistant, and more temperature resistant than a standard OEM boot.  Axles use molybdenum grease to provide low friction and smooth motion.
Trust in Demon Heavy Duty Axles to keep you riding!!

column2: 2019–2025 Can-Am Outlander 1000/570/650/850/1000 Max/570 Max/650 Max/850 Max, Renegade 1000/570/850/650 Front Left Xtreme Heavy Duty Axle
column3:
Our Strongest Axles To Date 

Our X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles are “Hell Rated” – upgraded from our Heavy Duty Line to handle the harshest terrains for racing in Desert, Sand, Mud, Rock and Short Courses. Demon X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles are our strongest axles to date. 

Through years of research and development Demon Powersports has developed a RACE READY, ULTIMATE PERFORMANCE axle that doesn’t burn a hole in your pocket and adheres to the highest quality standards. The success behind our products stems from thorough quality control. Our products go through extensive and extreme testing and R&D before launching.? 

Entire Axle Made Up of 4340 Chromoly Steel Material (In-and-Out) 

These axles are bigger, beefier, and stronger. Demon X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles are built using larger CV joints and shafts, paired with our proprietary dual heat treatment process, and 4340 Chromoly Steel material for all its components including the shaft, housing, cage, race, and balls.  

This gives the axles the edge it needs for superior strength and longevity. We re-engineered our cage design to enhance durability and use Molybdenum grease to lubricate the internal components. The axle's inner components are micro-polished, so the CVs don't heat up like other products.  

4340 chromoly steel is more elastic meaning the axle shaft and its components will absorb any stress and keeps it within itself, eliminating any stress from being transferred into the differential and through your drivetrain. This helps preserve other components on the car! 

Available for Long Travel Kits 

Our X-Treme Heavy Duty are also tailored made to work with all major Long Travel Suspension Kits & Lift Kits. We understand the requirment for the desert and dunes. As provide an out of the box solution since they are already optimized for heat so your CVs can run cooler and last longer.  If you don’t believe us talk to any one of our racers in BITD, SCORE, SNORA, DAKHAR etc whom trust and use our products! 

Our long travel axles are tailor made to fit the following suspension kits Cognito Motorsports, Extreme Performance, Fireball Racing HCR, NXS Designs, Madigan Motorsports, SF Raceworks, LSK, Lone Star Racing, Fifty6 Industries, FabWerx, Grounder 4, UTV Wolfpack, Reflex, Long Travel Industries and much more!! 

If you need a long travel axle click here to get directed to the correct page! (INSERT LINK) 

Backed with 2-Years Limited Warranty 

Demon Xtreme axles come with an industry first 2yr limited warranty! We know our axles are built and designed for the baddest and toughest machines, that’s why we have paired our axles with the best warranty in the industry! Our #1 priority here at Demon Powersports is your happiness. Which means we stand behind our products. If you have a problem, we will solve it. Just reach out to our Customer Support Team. We’re here for you. Happiness & Performance guaranteed. 

Trust In Demon X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles To Keep You Riding!! 

If you have an axle that is optimized for heat and strength then you can have no fear running more power or larger tires on your machine meaning you can have the baddest and toughest machine out there without worrying about getting left behind in the sand, rocks, trail or mud!!

column2: 2016–2022 Polaris Ranger 570/500 Front Electric Power Steering Kit
column3:
Significantly Reduces Steering Efforts 

The Rugged Electric Power Steering Kit is a must have for any off-road enthusiast. Each kit is a bolt-on system that reduces steering effort and gets rid of wheel jerk/bump steer when navigating rough terrains.  

It allows you to steer easily with one hand or even just one finger on the wheel. Designed to make your ride better, even when running larger tires or modified suspension. 

The mount plate positions the motor and steering shafts under the dash for discrete visibility with no driver interference. All components are sealed to protect against water, dust, and other debris. The kit is complete to easily covert your machine’s steering to EPS! 

Available For ATV & UTV Applications 

We offer kits for all the popular brands: Polaris, Can Am, Honda, Kawasaki, Yamaha, John Deere, Cf-Moto, Hisun and many more.

column2: 2020–2022 Polaris Ranger 1000 Front Electric Power Steering Kit
column3:
Significantly Reduces Steering Efforts 

The Rugged Electric Power Steering Kit is a must have for any off-road enthusiast. Each kit is a bolt-on system that reduces steering effort and gets rid of wheel jerk/bump steer when navigating rough terrains.  

It allows you to steer easily with one hand or even just one finger on the wheel. Designed to make your ride better, even when running larger tires or modified suspension. 

The mount plate positions the motor and steering shafts under the dash for discrete visibility with no driver interference. All components are sealed to protect against water, dust, and other debris. The kit is complete to easily covert your machine’s steering to EPS!

column2: 2019–2025 Can-Am Outlander 1000/570/650/850/1000 Max/570 Max/650 Max/850 Max, Renegade 1000/570/850/650 Front Left Xtreme Heavy Duty Axle Race Spec 4340
column3:
Our Strongest Axles To Date 
Our X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles are “Hell Rated” – upgraded from our Heavy Duty Line to handle the harshest terrains for racing in Desert, Sand, Mud, Rock and Short Courses. Demon X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles are our strongest axles to date. 
Through years of research and development Demon Powersports has developed a RACE READY, ULTIMATE PERFORMANCE axle that doesn’t burn a hole in your pocket and adheres to the highest quality standards. The success behind our products stems from thorough quality control. Our products go through extensive and extreme testing and R&D before launching.? 
Entire Axle Made Up of 4340 Chromoly Steel Material (In-and-Out) 
These axles are bigger, beefier, and stronger. Demon X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles are built using larger CV joints and shafts, paired with our proprietary dual heat treatment process, and 4340 Chromoly Steel material for all its components including the shaft, housing, cage, race, and balls.  
This gives the axles the edge it needs for superior strength and longevity. We re-engineered our cage design to enhance durability and use Molybdenum grease to lubricate the internal components. The axle's inner components are micro-polished, so the CVs don't heat up like other products.  
4340 chromoly steel is more elastic meaning the axle shaft and its components will absorb any stress and keeps it within itself, eliminating any stress from being transferred into the differential and through your drivetrain. This helps preserve other components on the car! 
Available for Long Travel Kits 
Our X-Treme Heavy Duty are also tailored made to work with all major Long Travel Suspension Kits & Lift Kits. We understand the requirment for the desert and dunes. As provide an out of the box solution since they are already optimized for heat so your CVs can run cooler and last longer.  If you don’t believe us talk to any one of our racers in BITD, SCORE, SNORA, DAKHAR etc whom trust and use our products! 
Our long travel axles are tailor made to fit the following suspension kits Cognito Motorsports, Extreme Performance, Fireball Racing HCR, NXS Designs, Madigan Motorsports, SF Raceworks, LSK, Lone Star Racing, Fifty6 Industries, FabWerx, Grounder 4, UTV Wolfpack, Reflex, Long Travel Industries and much more!! 
If you need a long travel axle click here to get directed to the correct page! (INSERT LINK) 
Backed with 2-Years Limited Warranty 
Demon Xtreme axles come with an industry first 2yr limited warranty! We know our axles are built and designed for the baddest and toughest machines, that’s why we have paired our axles with the best warranty in the industry! Our #1 priority here at Demon Powersports is your happiness. Which means we stand behind our products. If you have a problem, we will solve it. Just reach out to our Customer Support Team. We’re here for you. Happiness & Performance guaranteed. 
Trust In Demon X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles To Keep You Riding!! 
If you have an axle that is optimized for heat and strength then you can have no fear running more power or larger tires on your machine meaning you can have the baddest and toughest machine out there without worrying about getting left behind in the sand, rocks, trail or mud!!
column6: Xtreme Heavy Duty Axle Race Spec 4340

column2: 2022–2025 Polaris RZR 200 Rear Left, Rear Right Heavy Duty Axle
column3:
Through years of research and development Demon Powersports has developed an axle that doesn’t burn a hole in your pocket and adheres to the highest quality standards. These axles are bigger, beefier, and stronger. 
Demon Heavy Duty Axles are built using larger CV joints and shafts, paired with our proprietary dual heat treatment process, and 4340 Chromoly Steel inner CV cage gives these the axles the edge it needs for superior strength and longevity. 
These axles also utilize a unique double plunge design which allows it to achieve higher articulation angles approximately, the axles are designed to slide on the bar splines allowing for 1.5 inches of travel and 40° articulation over terrain on the inboard joint. The outboard joint can travel 0.5inches and swing from 45°-47° depending on the model. 
The Demon heavy duty axles are equipped The TPEE (Thermoplastic polyester elastomer) boots which are stronger, stiffer, more fatigue resistant, puncture resistant, and more temperature resistant than a standard OEM boot.  Axles use molybdenum grease to provide low friction and smooth motion.
Trust in Demon Heavy Duty Axles to keep you riding!!

column2: Universal Application Wheel Adaptor Front, Rear Rugged Wheel Spacer
column3:
Rugged wheels spacers are made from T6061 aluminum alloy and are precisely CNC machined for accurate dimensions. Spacers can be direct bolt on and can use OEM studs. Each wheel spacer comes in 3 different thickness. Each wheel spacer comes with a 1 year warranty. 
If you are looking to widen the stance of your machine, clear larger tires or get some new rims. These spacers are just what you need.

column2: 2011–2024 Can-Am Defender HD9/HD8/HD10/Max HD10/Max HD8/HD5/HD7, Commander 1000/800/Max 1000, Maverick 1000/Max 1000/X3/X3 Max/Trail 1000/Trail 800/Sport 1000/Sport Max 1000 Lower Xtreme Heavy Duty Ball Joint Race Spec
column3:
Demon Xtreme Heavy Duty Race Spec Ball Joint sets the industry standard for unmatched durability and performance. Engineered specifically for vehicles with lifts and oversized tires, it outlasts nearly all competitors. 
Our innovative design eliminates the snap ring, opting for a threaded chromoly body for secure ball joint retention. 
Constructed from 300M stud and dual heat-treated 4340 chromoly steel body and finished with zinc plating, it ensures supreme durability. 
Moreover, the Demon Xtreme Ball Joint is adjustable, rebuildable, and greaseable, maintaining smooth operation for years to come.
column6: Xtreme Heavy Duty Ball Joint Race Spec

column2: 2012–2025 Can-Am Renegade 1000/800/500/570/850, Outlander 800/800 Max/1000/500/650/1000 Max/500 Max/650 Max/450/450 Max/570/850/570 Max/850 Max Front Xtreme Heavy Duty Tie Rod Race Spec
column3: The X-treme Heavy Duty Race Spec Tie Rod is an essential element of your steering mechanism that you wouldn't want to overlook. Crafted from robust 7075 aircraft-grade aluminum with rod ends made of Chromoly steel, our Tie Rods are engineered to withstand any level of force exerted on them. Designed to enhance strength and address the common failure points associated with OEM parts, these Tie Rods ensure reliability and durability. The incorporation of a heavy-duty billet aluminum rod, paired with chromoly steel ends and heim joints that are both chrome and zinc-plated, adds an extra layer of corrosion resistance, guaranteeing a long-lasting performance upgrade for your steering system.
column6: Xtreme Heavy Duty Tie Rod Race Spec

The incorporation of a heavy-duty billet aluminum rod, paired with chromoly steel ends and heim joints that are both chrome and zinc-plated, adds an extra layer of corrosion resistance, guaranteeing a long-lasting performance upgrade for your steering system.
column6: Xtreme Heavy Duty Tie Rod Race Spec

column2: 2022–2024 Polaris RZR Pro R Front Left, Front Right Xtreme Heavy Duty Long Travel Axle Race Spec 300M
column3:
Our Strongest Axle to Date, You can say we have of the strongest UTV/SXS axles on the market if not “the one”.
We have made our best axle even better now. The Demon Xtreme Race Spec axles are redesigned and re-engineered with a robust 300M shaft designed to flex and absorb force, ensuring unparalleled durability. Say goodbye to constant CV breakages and drivetrain failures – our product is engineered to withstand the toughest challenges, making it perfect for heavy lifting, oversized tires, and endless adventures. Get ready for a driving experience like never before with our solution tailored for maximum strength and fun.
Keeping true to our roots we have developed a RACE READY ultimate performance axle that does not burn a hole in your pocket an adheres to the highest quality standard. 
What sets the 300M steel apart is its composition. This aircraft-grade alloy is a modified, reinforced version of the already robust 4340 chromoly, enhanced with the addition of Vanadium and a higher silicon content. Vanadium, a common element in high-speed tool steel (HSS), plays a crucial role in elevating the steel's strength to unparalleled levels. This means our 300M axles are built to withstand even the most demanding conditions, ensuring maximum durability and longevity. The increased Silicon content further enhances the steel's strength and hardness, while also providing superior resistance to high-temperature oxidation. This means you can count on our 300M axles to perform flawlessly, even in the harshest environments.
column6: Xtreme Heavy Duty Long Travel Axle Race Spec 300M

column2: 2015–2022 Honda TRX500, TRX420, TRX520 Demon Heavy Duty Bracket Lift Kit
column3: Take your machine to a new height! This 4 corner lift will pick your machine making room for larger tires. This also gives your vehicle a more beefy stance while giving practicality of more ground clearance. Lift kit consists of all parts, hardware and instructions to be installed. Install time is approximately 1 1/2 to 2 hours. This lift kit has been engineered with longevity and hard use in mind. A must have if you're wanting to get the most ground clearance out of your vehicle without harming your factory suspension.

column2: Universal ATV Power Steering Kit Electric Power Steering Kit
column3:
Significantly Reduces Steering Efforts 

The Rugged Electric Power Steering Kit is a must have for any off-road enthusiast. Each kit is a bolt-on system that reduces steering effort and gets rid of wheel jerk/bump steer when navigating rough terrains.  

It allows you to steer easily with one hand or even just one finger on the wheel. Designed to make your ride better, even when running larger tires or modified suspension. 

The mount plate positions the motor and steering shafts under the dash for discrete visibility with no driver interference. All components are sealed to protect against water, dust, and other debris. The kit is complete to easily covert your machine’s steering to EPS! 

Available For ATV & UTV Applications 

We offer kits for all the popular brands: Polaris, Can Am, Honda, Kawasaki, Yamaha, John Deere, Cf-Moto, Hisun and many more. 

Universal kits are available which are adaptable for Offshore ATV/UTV, Hot Rod, Mini Sprints, Buggies, Rock Crawlers, Mowers and more! 

Trust In Rugged EPS Kits to Keep You Riding!! 

Dominate the trails with ease. The success behind our products stems from thorough quality control and testing. Our products go through extensive and extreme testing, and R&D before launching.? 

Backed by a 1-Year Limited Warranty 

Our #1 priority here at Demon Powersports is your happiness. Which means we stand behind our products. If you have a problem, we will solve it. Just reach out to our Customer Support Team. We’re here for you. Happiness & Performance guaranteed.

column2: 2017-2025 Can-Am X3 Front Grille Blue
column3:
The Demon Powersports Front Grill from  provides your machine with an aggressive and stylish look that will absolutely turn heads.  The grills are offered in Black, Blue or Red colors. While keeping your machine looking unique the grill does not affect any performance allowing proper airflow to cooling and charge air systems
It replaces the factory plastic grill and easily mounts using a few screws. The Grill is not compatible with machines that have a front bumper.

column2: #N/A
column3:
All Demon brake pads are metallic bronze washed pads contain copper, tin, graphite and other metallic elements with nonferrous filaments.

The high-density built material results in consistent friction across a full range of operating temperatures and reduces brake fade at high temperatures.
Provides instant braking performance in wet or muddy conditions with exceptional stability in all temperatures.

The sintered metal brake pads are proven to last longer than carbon, Kevlar, semi-metallic and other organic brake pads.

The sintered metal brake pads are proven to last longer than carbon, Kevlar, semi-metallic and other organic brake pads.

column2: Heavy Duty 3500Lb Synthetic Rope Winch w/Wireless Remote
column3: The Demon Winches are the ultimate off-road companion, designed to tackle the toughest situations. They ensure you can confidently handle any adventure, whether on rocky terrains, muddy trails, snowy paths, or sandy dunes. With efficient and reliable recovery, these winches quickly rescue your vehicle from challenging terrains, minimizing downtime and keeping you moving. Their user-friendly and safe operation is enhanced by a long-range wireless remote, allowing for convenient, hassle-free winching from a safe distance. Constructed with high-quality materials, Demon Winches offer durability and long-term reliability. They are perfect for off-road adventures, work tasks, and emergencies, making them essential for any ATV or UTV owner.

column2: 2017–2024 Can-Am Maverick X3/X3 Max Rear Left, Rear Right Xtreme Heavy Duty Axle Race Spec 300M
column3:
Our Strongest Axle to Date, You can say we have of the strongest UTV/SXS axles on the market if not “the one”.
We have made our best axle even better now. The Demon Xtreme Race Spec axles are redesigned and re-engineered with a robust 300M shaft designed to flex and absorb force, ensuring unparalleled durability. Say goodbye to constant CV breakages and drivetrain failures – our product is engineered to withstand the toughest challenges, making it perfect for heavy lifting, oversized tires, and endless adventures. Get ready for a driving experience like never before with our solution tailored for maximum strength and fun.
Keeping true to our roots we have developed a RACE READY ultimate performance axle that does not burn a hole in your pocket an adheres to the highest quality standard. 
What sets the 300M steel apart is its composition. This aircraft-grade alloy is a modified, reinforced version of the already robust 4340 chromoly, enhanced with the addition of Vanadium and a higher silicon content. Vanadium, a common element in high-speed tool steel (HSS), plays a crucial role in elevating the steel's strength to unparalleled levels. This means our 300M axles are built to withstand even the most demanding conditions, ensuring maximum durability and longevity. The increased Silicon content further enhances the steel's strength and hardness, while also providing superior resistance to high-temperature oxidation. This means you can count on our 300M axles to perform flawlessly, even in the harshest environments.
column6: Xtreme Heavy Duty Axle Race Spec 300M

column2: 2017–2025 Can-Am Maverick X3/X3 Max Rear Left, Rear Right Xtreme Heavy Duty Axle Race Spec 4340
column3:
Our Strongest Axles To Date 
Our X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles are “Hell Rated” – upgraded from our Heavy Duty Line to handle the harshest terrains for racing in Desert, Sand, Mud, Rock and Short Courses. Demon X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles are our strongest axles to date. 
Through years of research and development Demon Powersports has developed a RACE READY, ULTIMATE PERFORMANCE axle that doesn’t burn a hole in your pocket and adheres to the highest quality standards. The success behind our products stems from thorough quality control. Our products go through extensive and extreme testing and R&D before launching.? 
Entire Axle Made Up of 4340 Chromoly Steel Material (In-and-Out) 
These axles are bigger, beefier, and stronger. Demon X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles are built using larger CV joints and shafts, paired with our proprietary dual heat treatment process, and 4340 Chromoly Steel material for all its components including the shaft, housing, cage, race, and balls.  
This gives the axles the edge it needs for superior strength and longevity. We re-engineered our cage design to enhance durability and use Molybdenum grease to lubricate the internal components. The axle's inner components are micro-polished, so the CVs don't heat up like other products.  
4340 chromoly steel is more elastic meaning the axle shaft and its components will absorb any stress and keeps it within itself, eliminating any stress from being transferred into the differential and through your drivetrain. This helps preserve other components on the car! 
Available for Long Travel Kits 
Our X-Treme Heavy Duty are also tailored made to work with all major Long Travel Suspension Kits & Lift Kits. We understand the requirment for the desert and dunes. As provide an out of the box solution since they are already optimized for heat so your CVs can run cooler and last longer.  If you don’t believe us talk to any one of our racers in BITD, SCORE, SNORA, DAKHAR etc whom trust and use our products! 
Our long travel axles are tailor made to fit the following suspension kits Cognito Motorsports, Extreme Performance, Fireball Racing HCR, NXS Designs, Madigan Motorsports, SF Raceworks, LSK, Lone Star Racing, Fifty6 Industries, FabWerx, Grounder 4, UTV Wolfpack, Reflex, Long Travel Industries and much more!! 
If you need a long travel axle click here to get directed to the correct page! (INSERT LINK) 
Backed with 2-Years Limited Warranty 
Demon Xtreme axles come with an industry first 2yr limited warranty! We know our axles are built and designed for the baddest and toughest machines, that’s why we have paired our axles with the best warranty in the industry! Our #1 priority here at Demon Powersports is your happiness. Which means we stand behind our products. If you have a problem, we will solve it. Just reach out to our Customer Support Team. We’re here for you. Happiness & Performance guaranteed. 
Trust In Demon X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles To Keep You Riding!! 
If you have an axle that is optimized for heat and strength then you can have no fear running more power or larger tires on your machine meaning you can have the baddest and toughest machine out there without worrying about getting left behind in the sand, rocks, trail or mud!!
column6: Xtreme Heavy Duty Axle Race Spec 4340

column1: 2024+- Can--Am- Defender- HD10- Front Long- Travel Axle +5"
column2: 2024+ Can-Am Defender HD10 Front Long Travel Axle +5"
column3:
Through years of research and development Demon Powersports has developed an axle that doesn’t burn a hole in your pocket and adheres to the highest quality standards. These axles are bigger, beefier, and stronger. 
Demon Heavy Duty Lift kit Axles are built using larger CV joints and shafts, paired with our proprietary dual heat treatment process, and 4340 Chromoly Steel inner CV cage gives these the axles the edge it needs for superior strength and longevity. 
These axles also utilize a unique double plunge design which allows it to achieve higher articulation angles approximately, the axles are designed to slide on the bar splines allowing for 1.5 inches of travel and 40° articulation over terrain on the inboard joint. The outboard joint can travel 0.5inches and swing from 45°-47° depending on the model. 
The Demon heavy duty axles are equipped The TPEE (Thermoplastic polyester elastomer) boots which are stronger, stiffer, more fatigue resistant, puncture resistant, and more temperature resistant than a standard OEM boot.  Axles use molybdenum grease to provide low friction and smooth motion.
Trust in Demon Heavy Duty Axles to keep you riding!!

These axles are bigger, beefier, and stronger. Demon X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles are built using larger CV joints and shafts, paired with our proprietary dual heat treatment process, and 4340 Chromoly Steel material for all its components including the shaft, housing, cage, race, and balls.  

This gives the axles the edge it needs for superior strength and longevity. We re-engineered our cage design to enhance durability and use Molybdenum grease to lubricate the internal components. The axle's inner components are micro-polished, so the CVs don't heat up like other products.  

4340 chromoly steel is more elastic meaning the axle shaft and its components will absorb any stress and keeps it within itself, eliminating any stress from being transferred into the differential and through your drivetrain. This helps preserve other components on the car! 

Available for Long Travel Kits 

Our X-Treme Heavy Duty are also tailored made to work with all major Long Travel Suspension Kits & Lift Kits. We understand the requirment for the desert and dunes. As provide an out of the box solution since they are already optimized for heat so your CVs can run cooler and last longer.  If you don’t believe us talk to any one of our racers in BITD, SCORE, SNORA, DAKHAR etc whom trust and use our products! 

Our long travel axles are tailor made to fit the following suspension kits Cognito Motorsports, Extreme Performance, Fireball Racing HCR, NXS Designs, Madigan Motorsports, SF Raceworks, LSK, Lone Star Racing, Fifty6 Industries, FabWerx, Grounder 4, UTV Wolfpack, Reflex, Long Travel Industries and much more!!

column6: Xtreme Heavy Duty Lift Kit Axle

column2: 2024–2024 Can-Am Maverick R Front Left, Front Right Heavy Duty Axle
column3:
Through years of research and development Demon Powersports has developed an axle that doesn’t burn a hole in your pocket and adheres to the highest quality standards. These axles are bigger, beefier, and stronger. 
Demon Heavy Duty Axles are built using larger CV joints and shafts, paired with our proprietary dual heat treatment process, and 4340 Chromoly Steel inner CV cage gives these the axles the edge it needs for superior strength and longevity. 
These axles also utilize a unique double plunge design which allows it to achieve higher articulation angles approximately, the axles are designed to slide on the bar splines allowing for 1.5 inches of travel and 40° articulation over terrain on the inboard joint. The outboard joint can travel 0.5inches and swing from 45°-47° depending on the model. 
The Demon heavy duty axles are equipped The TPEE (Thermoplastic polyester elastomer) boots which are stronger, stiffer, more fatigue resistant, puncture resistant, and more temperature resistant than a standard OEM boot.  Axles use molybdenum grease to provide low friction and smooth motion.
Trust in Demon Heavy Duty Axles to keep you riding!!

column2: 2024–2024 Can-Am Maverick R Front Left, Front Right Xtreme Heavy Duty Axle Race Spec 300M
column3:
Our Strongest Axle to Date, You can say we have of the strongest UTV/SXS axles on the market if not “the one”.
We have made our best axle even better now. The Demon Xtreme Race Spec axles are redesigned and re-engineered with a robust 300M shaft designed to flex and absorb force, ensuring unparalleled durability. Say goodbye to constant CV breakages and drivetrain failures – our product is engineered to withstand the toughest challenges, making it perfect for heavy lifting, oversized tires, and endless adventures. Get ready for a driving experience like never before with our solution tailored for maximum strength and fun.
Keeping true to our roots we have developed a RACE READY ultimate performance axle that does not burn a hole in your pocket an adheres to the highest quality standard. 
What sets the 300M steel apart is its composition. This aircraft-grade alloy is a modified, reinforced version of the already robust 4340 chromoly, enhanced with the addition of Vanadium and a higher silicon content. Vanadium, a common element in high-speed tool steel (HSS), plays a crucial role in elevating the steel's strength to unparalleled levels. This means our 300M axles are built to withstand even the most demanding conditions, ensuring maximum durability and longevity. The increased Silicon content further enhances the steel's strength and hardness, while also providing superior resistance to high-temperature oxidation. This means you can count on our 300M axles to perform flawlessly, even in the harshest environments.
column6: Xtreme Heavy Duty Axle Race Spec 300M

These axles are bigger, beefier, and stronger. Demon X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles are built using larger CV joints and shafts, paired with our proprietary dual heat treatment process, and 4340 Chromoly Steel material for all its components including the shaft, housing, cage, race, and balls.  
This gives the axles the edge it needs for superior strength and longevity. We re-engineered our cage design to enhance durability and use Molybdenum grease to lubricate the internal components. The axle's inner components are micro-polished, so the CVs don't heat up like other products.  
4340 chromoly steel is more elastic meaning the axle shaft and its components will absorb any stress and keeps it within itself, eliminating any stress from being transferred into the differential and through your drivetrain. This helps preserve other components on the car! 
Available for Long Travel Kits 
Our X-Treme Heavy Duty are also tailored made to work with all major Long Travel Suspension Kits & Lift Kits. We understand the requirment for the desert and dunes. As provide an out of the box solution since they are already optimized for heat so your CVs can run cooler and last longer.  If you don’t believe us talk to any one of our racers in BITD, SCORE, SNORA, DAKHAR etc whom trust and use our products! 
Our long travel axles are tailor made to fit the following suspension kits Cognito Motorsports, Extreme Performance, Fireball Racing HCR, NXS Designs, Madigan Motorsports, SF Raceworks, LSK, Lone Star Racing, Fifty6 Industries, FabWerx, Grounder 4, UTV Wolfpack, Reflex, Long Travel Industries and much more!! 
If you need a long travel axle click here to get directed to the correct page! (INSERT LINK) 
Backed with 2-Years Limited Warranty 
Demon Xtreme axles come with an industry first 2yr limited warranty! We know our axles are built and designed for the baddest and toughest machines, that’s why we have paired our axles with the best warranty in the industry! Our #1 priority here at Demon Powersports is your happiness. Which means we stand behind our products. If you have a problem, we will solve it. Just reach out to our Customer Support Team. We’re here for you. Happiness & Performance guaranteed. 
Trust In Demon X-Treme Heavy Duty Axles To Keep You Riding!! 
If you have an axle that is optimized for heat and strength then you can have no fear running more power or larger tires on your machine meaning you can have the baddest and toughest machine out there without worrying about getting left behind in the sand, rocks, trail or mud!!

column2: 2022–2025 Polaris RZR PRO XP/Turbo R/Pro S Rear Left, Rear Right Xtreme Heavy Duty Axle Race Spec 300M
column3:
Our Strongest Axle to Date, You can say we have of the strongest UTV/SXS axles on the market if not “the one”.
We have made our best axle even better now. The Demon Xtreme Race Spec axles are redesigned and re-engineered with a robust 300M shaft designed to flex and absorb force, ensuring unparalleled durability. Say goodbye to constant CV breakages and drivetrain failures – our product is engineered to withstand the toughest challenges, making it perfect for heavy lifting, oversized tires, and endless adventures. Get ready for a driving experience like never before with our solution tailored for maximum strength and fun.
Keeping true to our roots we have developed a RACE READY ultimate performance axle that does not burn a hole in your pocket an adheres to the highest quality standard. 
What sets the 300M steel apart is its composition. This aircraft-grade alloy is a modified, reinforced version of the already robust 4340 chromoly, enhanced with the addition of Vanadium and a higher silicon content. Vanadium, a common element in high-speed tool steel (HSS), plays a crucial role in elevating the steel's strength to unparalleled levels. This means our 300M axles are built to withstand even the most demanding conditions, ensuring maximum durability and longevity. The increased Silicon content further enhances the steel's strength and hardness, while also providing superior resistance to high-temperature oxidation. This means you can count on our 300M axles to perform flawlessly, even in the harshest environments.
column6: Xtreme Heavy Duty Axle Race Spec 300M

column2: 2024–2024 Polaris Ranger 1500, RZR 1000, Xpedition Front Left, Front Right Heavy Duty Axle
column3:
Through years of research and development Demon Powersports has developed an axle that doesn’t burn a hole in your pocket and adheres to the highest quality standards. These axles are bigger, beefier, and stronger. 
Demon Heavy Duty Axles are built using larger CV joints and shafts, paired with our proprietary dual heat treatment process, and 4340 Chromoly Steel inner CV cage gives these the axles the edge it needs for superior strength and longevity. 
These axles also utilize a unique double plunge design which allows it to achieve higher articulation angles approximately, the axles are designed to slide on the bar splines allowing for 1.5 inches of travel and 40° articulation over terrain on the inboard joint. The outboard joint can travel 0.5inches and swing from 45°-47° depending on the model. 
The Demon heavy duty axles are equipped The TPEE (Thermoplastic polyester elastomer) boots which are stronger, stiffer, more fatigue resistant, puncture resistant, and more temperature resistant than a standard OEM boot.  Axles use molybdenum grease to provide low friction and smooth motion.
Trust in Demon Heavy Duty Axles to keep you riding!!
